body:
Let's be honest. This is Rance were talking about.
he's NEVER screwing his own genderbent version, even if Ranceko urges him to. Or if he does.. he needs to be seriously alcoholized.
And besides, in 02, he did jerk off in front of the mirror anyway, lol. He sees his 'true self' just like already he is., although the mirros doesn't even show anyone's true self actually...
I think this is missing the "poor grammar" tag...I could barely follow along.
